import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Payment=()=>{const[paymentDetails,setPaymentDetails]=useState({cardNumber:'',cardExpiry:'',cardCVC:''});const[error,setError]=useState('');const[success,setSuccess]=useState('');const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setPaymentDetails({...paymentDetails,[name]:value});};const validateForm=()=>{const{cardNumber,cardExpiry,cardCVC}=paymentDetails;if(!cardNumber||!cardExpiry||!cardCVC){return false;}return true;};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!validateForm()){setError('Please fill in all the required fields.');return;}setError('');// Assuming payment always succeeds
